emerging_technologies.name: AI-Driven Code Synthesis
emerging_technologies.description: Systems capable of autonomously writing, testing, and deploying software based on high-level requirements provided by humans.
emerging_technologies.societal_implications: Reduces coding labor, potentially increases software development speed, raises questions about job displacement and software quality assurance.
emerging_technologies.adoption_factors: Requires robust AI training data, acceptance by developers, and integration into existing development environments.

emerging_technologies.name: Neural-Cloud Integration
emerging_technologies.description: Direct interface between human neural networks and cloud computing services for enhanced cognitive processing and data storage.
emerging_technologies.societal_implications: Enhances cognitive abilities but raises privacy and security concerns regarding personal data.
emerging_technologies.adoption_factors: Technology maturity, ethical regulations, public perception, and technological infrastructure.

emerging_technologies.name: Smart Cities Blockchain Infrastructure
emerging_technologies.description: A blockchain system to manage city services, transactions, and data securely and transparently.
emerging_technologies.societal_implications: Improves trust in municipal operations but requires overcoming blockchain's scalability and energy consumption challenges.
emerging_technologies.adoption_factors: Government initiatives, technological readiness, and public trust in blockchain technology.

emerging_technologies.name: Autonomous Urban Air Mobility
emerging_technologies.description: Fully autonomous flying vehicles for urban transportation, reducing traffic congestion and commute times.
emerging_technologies.societal_implications: Could revolutionize urban transport but requires significant regulatory changes and infrastructure development.
emerging_technologies.adoption_factors: Regulatory approval, public safety concerns, and infrastructure investment.

mainstream_technologies.name: AI Coding Assistants
mainstream_technologies.description: Advanced AI tools assisting in coding, debugging, and optimizing software development processes.
mainstream_technologies.adoption_status: Widely adopted in tech companies, becoming standard in software development.

mainstream_technologies.name: Energy Harvesting IoT Devices
mainstream_technologies.description: IoT devices that harvest ambient energy (solar, kinetic, thermal) for self-sustainability.
mainstream_technologies.adoption_status: Gaining traction in smart homes, wearables, and industrial IoT applications.

epoch_themes.description: The shift towards automation in daily life, from transportation to decision-making systems.
epoch_themes.societal_impact: Altering job landscapes, urban planning, and personal autonomy, with significant ethical considerations.
epoch_themes.global_trends: Increased focus on regulatory frameworks for autonomous technologies and their integration into societal infrastructure.

epoch_themes.description: Enhancing human cognitive abilities through technology, particularly via neural interfaces.
epoch_themes.societal_impact: Potential for cognitive inequality, privacy issues, and changes in educational methodologies.
epoch_themes.global_trends: Growing interest in brain-computer interfaces, leading to advancements in both medical and consumer sectors.
